title: Organon salutis an instrument to cleanse the stomach : as also divers new experiments of the virtue of tobacco and coffee, how much they conduce to preserve humane health / by W.R. ...
author: W. R. (Walter Rumsey), 1584-1660.
publisher: Printed by R. Hodgkinsonne for D. Pakeman ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Includes letters form Henry Blount and James Howell.
